casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 52PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2018 D. Martin Warf, Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, Candace S. Friel, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Berger, Philip E. Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorneys at Law, for Cooper, Roy A. (III).

Grayson Kelley, Chief Deputy.

Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Alexander McC. Peters, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Wake County Superior Court, District Attorney, for State of N.C. John R. Wester, Adam K. Doerr, Kevin Crandall, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, J. Dickson Phillips, III, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Hunt, James B., Jr., et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Wendy R. Weiser, Daniel I. Weiner, Wilfred U. Codrington, III, Brent Ferguson, Attorneys at Law, for Brennan Center for Justice at NYU School of Law, et al. Allison J. Riggs, Anita S. Earls, Emily E. Seawell, Attorneys at Law, for County Board Members.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of January 2018 by Plaintiff to Lift Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2018."
